title: "Review: Windows 11 version 23H2 marks the start of an AI future"
excerpt: "Microsoft has added a brand-new home page to the Settings app on Windows 11 with the 23H2 update, which presents a selection of most commonly used settings front and center. Instead of hunting for Bluetooth or system theme settings, you'll now see that sort of thing straight away as soon as you launch the Settings app."
